## URL.withoutFragment() method

Remove the fragment portion of this URL.

**Signature:**

```typescript
withoutFragment(): URL;
```
**Returns:**

[URL](./alfa-url.url.md)

## Remarks

This method is useful for contexts in which the fragment portion of the URL, which isn't passed from client to server, is of no interest.
